ygData.msgSnippet: Actually you still would have lost it to a non combination of items message. ( Even after the patch. ... From: Reedo [mailto:reedo@parlorcity.com] Sent:
ygData.messageBody:
Actually you still would have lost it to a non combination of items
message. ( Even after the patch.


-----Original Message-----
From: Reedo [mailto:reedo@...]
Sent: Monday, July 26, 1999 10:18 AM
To: EQ_SMITHS@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [EQ_SMITHS] Smithing Info Request


From: "Reedo" <reedo@...>

Most people don't realize this. I have had people ask me to sharpen all
sorts of things. Once I had a person ask me to sharpen his axe. I took
it
and put in in the forge. Then I inpected it to see exactly what it was.
Luckely I found out that it was a Mino Axe before I tried to shapen it.
This was back before the change and it would have been lost in a flash.

Mark
